languages.text:
The Overseer's keystone feature, Familiar Proficiency, lets them control a Familiar -- a powerful additional unit, each with its own set of abilities and talents. The Familiar appears even if the maximum number of characters in the retinue is reached. In most cases, the Familiar can't act on its own in combat, thus depending on its Overseer and their commands.
The Overseer's keystone ability, Reactivate, allows them to revivify an unconscious Familiar. Although it costs 3 AP and has a 2-round cooldown, it completely turns the tide of combat if utilised at the right moment.
The Overseer's heroic act restores the Familiar's wounds to 100% (even if it's unconscious) and lowers the cost of the next 3 Overseer's abilities by -1. Also, it unlocks the special passive effect distinct to each Familiar.
Key characteristics: Fellowship, Intelligence, Perception.
Skills: Carouse, Coercion, Medicae, Tech-Use, Awareness.

traits.locale_text:
The Overseer's keystone feature, Familiar Proficiency, lets them control a Familiar -- a powerful additional unit, each with its own set of abilities and talents. The Familiar appears even if the maximum number of characters in the retinue is reached. In most cases, the Familiar can't act on its own in combat, thus depending on its Overseer and their commands.
The Overseer's keystone ability, Reactivate, allows them to revivify an unconscious Familiar. Although it costs 3 AP and has a 2-round cooldown, it completely turns the tide of combat if utilised at the right moment.
The Overseer's heroic act restores the Familiar's wounds to 100% (even if it's unconscious) and lowers the cost of the next 3 Overseer's abilities by -1. Also, it unlocks the special passive effect distinct to each Familiar.
Key characteristics: Fellowship, Intelligence, Perception.
Skills: Carouse, Coercion, Medicae, Tech-Use, Awareness.

languages.text: The Overseer's keystone feature, selected from several options, allows them to control a familiar. Each option determines which familiar they can control. The familiar is a supplementary unit with its own set of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. It does not count toward the party character limit. By default, a familiar is controlled by its Overseer and cannot act on its own in combat. The Overseer's ability, {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g}, allows them to restore {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to a deactivated familiar, thus bringing it back into combat. Although it costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can only be used once every 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, it can completely change the course of a battle if used wisely. The Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} brings their familiar to full wounds (even if it is deactivated) and reduces the cost of the Overseer's next three abilities by −1 AP. Also, it activates the familiar's unique passive bonus. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Skills: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.

The Overseer's heroic act restores the Familiar's wounds to 100% (even if it's unconscious) and lowers the cost of the next 3 Overseer's abilities by -1. Also, it unlocks the special passive effect distinct to each Familiar.
Key characteristics: Fellowship, Intelligence, Perception.
Skills: Carouse, Coercion, Medicae, Tech-Use, Awareness.

traits.locale_text: The Overseer's keystone feature, selected out of several options, allows them to control a familiar. Each option determines, which familiar they can control. The familiar is a supplementary unit with its own set of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. It does not count toward the party character limit. By default, in combat, a familiar is controlled by its Overseer and cannot act on its own. The Overseer's ability, {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g}, allows them to restore {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to a deactivated familiar, thus bringing it back to combat. Although it costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can only be used once per 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, it can completely change the course of a battle, if used wisely. The Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} brings their familiar to full wounds (even if it is deactivated) and reduces the cost of the Overseer's next three abilities by −1 AP. Also, it activates the familiar's unique passive bonus. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Skills: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.

languages.text: Ключевое умение надзирателя, которое можно выбрать из нескольких вариантов, позволяет ему управлять фамильяром. Каждый вариант определяет, что это будет за фамильяр. Он представляет собой дополнительную боевую единицу с собственным набором {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g}, которая не входит в лимит отряда по количеству персонажей. Обычно в бою фамильяр не может действовать самостоятельно. Им управляет его надзиратель. Способность надзирателя {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Перезапуск{/g} позволяет восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} деактивированного фамильяра, вернув его обратно в бой. Она требует 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, а применять ее можно не чаще чем раз в 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}, но при умелом использовании она способна изменить исход боя. {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Героический акт{/g} надзирателя полностью восстанавливает здоровье фамильяра (даже деактивированного), сокращает стоимость следующих трех способностей надзирателя на 1 ОД и активирует уникальный пассивный бонус фамильяра. Важные {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} надзирателя: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g}. Навыки надзирателя: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательность{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напор{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Техника{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Устойчивость{/g}.

Ключевое умение надзирателя, которое можно выбрать из нескольких вариантов, позволяет ему управлять фамильяром. Каждый вариант определяет, что это будет за фамильяр. Он представляет собой дополнительную боевую единицу с собственным набором {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g}, которая не входит в лимит отряда по количеству персонажей. Способность надзирателя {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Перезапуск{/g} позволяет восстановить {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} деактивированного фамильяра, вернув его обратно в бой. languages.text: La característica clave del supervisor, elegida entre varias opciones, le permite controlar un familiar. Las diversas opciones determinan qué tipo de familiar controla. Un familiar es una unidad complementaria con sus propios {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}. No cuenta para el límite de personajes del grupo. Por defecto un familiar está bajo el control de su supervisor y no actúa por su cuenta en combate. La capacidad {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivación{/g}, del supervisor le permite restaurar las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de un familiar desactivado, haciendo que vuelva al combate. Aunque cuesta 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y solo se puede usar una vez cada 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}, puede cambiar completamente el curso de una batalla si la usas con cabeza. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} del supervisor restaura completamente las heridas de su familiar (aunque haya quedado desactivado) y reduce el coste de las siguientes tres capacidades del supervisor en −1 PA. Además activa la bonificación pasiva exclusiva de su familiar. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}. Habilidades: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Juerga{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Uso de tecnología{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Overseer's keystone feature, selected from several options, allows them to control a familiar. Each option determines which familiar they can control. The familiar is a supplementary unit with its own set of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. It does not count toward the party character limit. By default, a familiar is controlled by its Overseer and cannot act on its own in combat. The Overseer's ability, {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g}, allows them to restore {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to a deactivated familiar, thus bringing it back into combat. Although it costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can only be used once every 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, it can completely change the course of a battle if used wisely. The Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} brings their familiar to full wounds (even if it is deactivated) and reduces the cost of the Overseer's next three abilities by −1 AP. Also, it activates the familiar's unique passive bonus. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Skills: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La característica clave del supervisor, elegida entre varias opciones, le permite controlar un familiar. Las diversas opciones determinan qué tipo de familiar controla. Un familiar es una unidad complementaria con sus propios {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}. No cuenta para el límite de personajes del grupo. Por defecto un familiar está bajo el control de su supervisor y no actúa por su cuenta en combate. El {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} del supervisor restaura completamente las heridas de su familiar (aunque haya quedado desactivado) y reduce el coste de las siguientes tres capacidades del supervisor en −1 PA. Además activa la bonificación pasiva exclusiva de su familiar. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Características{/g} relevantes: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}. Habilidades: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Juerga{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Uso de tecnología{/g}.

languages.text: 使仆是监察官的核心特色，玩家可以从多种不同的使仆中进行选择。使仆为辅助单位，不同的使仆拥有各自不同的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，使仆数量不会计入队伍成员数量。通常情况下，使仆由监察官进行指挥，在战斗中无法自行行动。 监察官的能力{g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}重新激活{/g}，可以为机能停止的使仆恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，使其再次加入战斗。尽管使用此能力需要耗费3点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，且每两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}只能使用一次，但如果使用得当，便可以在很大程度上扭转战局。 监察官的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以完全恢复使仆的生命值（对机能停止的使仆也同样生效），同时使监察官接下来三个能力消耗的行动点数降低1点。除此之外，还可以激活使仆独特的被动加成效果。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}。 技能：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}科技使用{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Overseer's keystone feature, selected from several options, allows them to control a familiar. Each option determines which familiar they can control. The familiar is a supplementary unit with its own set of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. It does not count toward the party character limit. By default, a familiar is controlled by its Overseer and cannot act on its own in combat. The Overseer's ability, {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g}, allows them to restore {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to a deactivated familiar, thus bringing it back into combat. Although it costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can only be used once every 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, it can completely change the course of a battle if used wisely. The Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} brings their familiar to full wounds (even if it is deactivated) and reduces the cost of the Overseer's next three abilities by −1 AP. Also, it activates the familiar's unique passive bonus. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Skills: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使仆是监察官的核心特色，玩家可以从多种不同的使仆中进行选择。使仆为辅助单位，不同的使仆拥有各自不同的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，使仆数量不会计入队伍成员数量。通常情况下，使仆由监察官进行指挥，在战斗中无法自行行动。 监察官的能力{g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}重新激活{/g}，可以为机能停止的使仆恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，使其再次加入战斗。尽管使用此能力需要耗费3点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，且每两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}只能使用一次，但如果使用得当，便可以在很大程度上扭转战局。 监察官的{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}可以完全恢复使仆的生命值（对机能停止的使仆也同样生效），同时使监察官接下来三个能力消耗的行动点数降低1点。除此之外，还可以激活使仆独特的被动加成效果。 关键{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}。 技能：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}饮酒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}科技使用{/g}。

languages.text: Gözetmen'in birkaç seçenek arasından seçebileceği kilit özelliği, bir iyeyi kontrol edebilmesini sağlar. Her bir seçenek, hangi iyeyi kontrol edeceğini belirler. İye, kendine özgü {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceri{/g} setine sahip bir destek birimidir. Grubun karakter sayısı sınırına etki etmez. İye, çatışma esnasında normalde Gözetmen'i tarafından kontrol edilir ve kendi başına hareket edemez. Gözetmen'in {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Yeniden Başlat{/g} kabiliyeti, devre dışı kalan bir iyenin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanını tazeleyerek onu çatışmaya geri döndürür. Her ne kadar 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcasa ve her 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} sadece bir kez kullanılabilse de akıllıca kullanılırsa çatışmanın seyrini tamamen değiştirebilir. Gözetmen'in {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemi{/g}, iyesinin sağlık puanını tamamen tazeler (devre dışı kalmış olsa bile) ve Gözetmen'in sonraki üç kabiliyetinin bedelini 1 EP azaltır. Ayrıca iyenin eşsiz pasif bonusunu da etkinleştirir. Kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}. Yetenekler: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Farkındalık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Tiryakilik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Gözdağı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Sıhhiye{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tekno Aşinalığı{/g}.

The familiar is a supplementary unit with its own set of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. It does not count toward the party character limit. By default, a familiar is controlled by its Overseer and cannot act on its own in combat. The Overseer's ability, {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g}, allows them to restore {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to a deactivated familiar, thus bringing it back into combat. Also, it activates the familiar's unique passive bonus. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Skills: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen'in birkaç seçenek arasından seçebileceği kilit özelliği, bir iyeyi kontrol edebilmesini sağlar. Her bir seçenek, hangi iyeyi kontrol edeceğini belirler. İye, kendine özgü {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceri{/g} setine sahip bir destek birimidir. Grubun karakter sayısı sınırına etki etmez. Gözetmen'in {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Yeniden Başlat{/g} kabiliyeti, devre dışı kalan bir iyenin {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanını tazeleyerek onu çatışmaya geri döndürür. Her ne kadar 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcasa ve her 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} sadece bir kez kullanılabilse de akıllıca kullanılırsa çatışmanın seyrini tamamen değiştirebilir. Gözetmen'in {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylemi{/g}, iyesinin sağlık puanını tamamen tazeler (devre dışı kalmış olsa bile) ve Gözetmen'in sonraki üç kabiliyetinin bedelini 1 EP azaltır. Ayrıca iyenin eşsiz pasif bonusunu da etkinleştirir. Kilit {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Yetenekler{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Farkındalık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Tiryakilik{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Gözdağı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Sıhhiye{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tekno Aşinalığı{/g}.

languages.text: Die aus mehreren Optionen gewählte wesentliche Eigenschaft des Aufsehers ermöglicht ihm die Steuerung eines Vertrauten. Jede Option legt fest, welchen Vertrauten er steuern kann. Der Vertraute ist eine Ergänzungseinheit mit eigenen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talenten{/g}. Er fließt nicht in das Charakterlimit der Gruppe ein. Standardmäßig wird ein Vertrauter von seinem Aufseher gesteuert und kann im Kampf nicht eigenständig agieren. Mit der Fähigkeit {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reaktivieren{/g} kann der Aufseher {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} eines deaktivierten Vertrauen regenerieren, um ihn in den Kampf zurückzuholen. Dies kostet zwar 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und ist nur alle 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} möglich, kann den Verlauf einer Schlacht aber nachhaltig beeinflussen. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Aufsehers regeneriert alle Wunden des Vertrauten (selbst wenn er deaktiviert ist) und reduziert die Kosten der nächsten drei Fähigkeiten des Aufsehers um -1 AP. Außerdem wird der einzigartige passive Bonus des Vertrauten aktiviert. Wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}. Fertigkeiten: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Einsatz{/g}.

By default, a familiar is controlled by its Overseer and cannot act on its own in combat. The Overseer's ability, {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g}, allows them to restore {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to a deactivated familiar, thus bringing it back into combat. Although it costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can only be used once every 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, it can completely change the course of a battle if used wisely. The Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} brings their familiar to full wounds (even if it is deactivated) and reduces the cost of the Overseer's next three abilities by −1 AP. Also, it activates the familiar's unique passive bonus. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Skills: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Die aus mehreren Optionen gewählte wesentliche Eigenschaft des Aufsehers ermöglicht ihm die Steuerung eines Vertrauten. Jede Option legt fest, welchen Vertrauten er steuern kann. Der Vertraute ist eine Ergänzungseinheit mit eigenen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talenten{/g}. Er fließt nicht in das Charakterlimit der Gruppe ein. Standardmäßig wird ein Vertrauter von seinem Aufseher gesteuert und kann im Kampf nicht eigenständig agieren. Mit der Fähigkeit {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reaktivieren{/g} kann der Aufseher {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} eines deaktivierten Vertrauen regenerieren, um ihn in den Kampf zurückzuholen. Dies kostet zwar 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und ist nur alle 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} möglich, kann den Verlauf einer Schlacht aber nachhaltig beeinflussen. Die {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} des Aufsehers regeneriert alle Wunden des Vertrauten (selbst wenn er deaktiviert ist) und reduziert die Kosten der nächsten drei Fähigkeiten des Aufsehers um -1 AP. Außerdem wird der einzigartige passive Bonus des Vertrauten aktiviert. Wesentliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}. Fertigkeiten: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Zechen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Zwang{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Einsatz{/g}.

languages.text: 監督官の主要な特徴は、いくつかの選択肢から選ばれ、その選択によって制御できるファミリアーが決まる。ファミリアーは独自の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}を持つ補助ユニットで、パーティのキャラクター上限にはカウントされない。基本的にファミリアーは監督官によって制御される。戦闘中に自律的に行動することはできない。 監督官のアビリティ、{g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}再起動{/g}を使用すると、無効状態のファミリアーの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復させて、戦闘に復帰させることができる。これには3{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費する。2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に1度しか使用できないが、うまく使えば戦況を一変させる力を持つ。 監督官の{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使うと、ファミリアーは傷が全回復し（無効状態の場合も）、監督官が次回使用する3つのアビリティのAPコストが−1になる。さらに、ファミリアー固有のパッシブボーナスが発動する。 主要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}。 スキル：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}強制力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}技術使用{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Overseer's keystone feature, selected from several options, allows them to control a familiar. Each option determines which familiar they can control. The familiar is a supplementary unit with its own set of {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. It does not count toward the party character limit. By default, a familiar is controlled by its Overseer and cannot act on its own in combat. The Overseer's ability, {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g}, allows them to restore {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to a deactivated familiar, thus bringing it back into combat. Although it costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can only be used once every 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, it can completely change the course of a battle if used wisely. The Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} brings their familiar to full wounds (even if it is deactivated) and reduces the cost of the Overseer's next three abilities by −1 AP. Also, it activates the familiar's unique passive bonus. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Skills: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Carouse{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Tech-Use{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 監督官の主要な特徴は、いくつかの選択肢から選ばれ、その選択によって制御できるファミリアーが決まる。ファミリアーは独自の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}を持つ補助ユニットで、パーティのキャラクター上限にはカウントされない。基本的にファミリアーは監督官によって制御される。戦闘中に自律的に行動することはできない。 監督官のアビリティ、{g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}再起動{/g}を使用すると、無効状態のファミリアーの{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を回復させて、戦闘に復帰させることができる。これには3{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費する。2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に1度しか使用できないが、うまく使えば戦況を一変させる力を持つ。 監督官の{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}を使うと、ファミリアーは傷が全回復し（無効状態の場合も）、監督官が次回使用する3つのアビリティのAPコストが−1になる。さらに、ファミリアー固有のパッシブボーナスが発動する。 主要な{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}。 スキル：{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}身体作用耐性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}強制力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}技術使用{/g}。

languages.text: La caractéristique principale du surveillant lui permet de contrôler un familier, dont le type dépend de l'option choisie. Le familier est une unité complémentaire, dotée de ses propres {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}. Il n'est pas déduit du nombre maximum de membres du groupe. Par défaut, un familier est contrôlé par son surveillant et ne peut pas agir de lui-même en combat. La capacité {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Réactivation{/g} du surveillant restaure la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} d'un familier désactivé pour lui permettre de reprendre le combat. Bien qu'elle coûte 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et ne soit utilisable qu'une fois tous les 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, elle peut renverser le cours d'un affrontement si elle est utilisée judicieusement. L'{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acte héroïque{/g} du surveillant régénère toute la réserve de blessures du familier (même s'il est désactivé) et réduit de 1 PA le coût des trois prochaines capacités du surveillant. De plus, elle active le bonus passif unique du familier. {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Caractéristiques{/g} clés : {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. Compétences : {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCarouse}Résistance aux intoxications{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SkillTechUse}Technomaîtrise{/g}.

By default, a familiar is controlled by its Overseer and cannot act on its own in combat. The Overseer's ability, {g|f:374265cc61d5475898f17ac969795f7c}Reactivate{/g}, allows them to restore {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to a deactivated familiar, thus bringing it back into combat. Although it costs 3 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and can only be used once every 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, it can completely change the course of a battle if used wisely. The Overseer's {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} brings their familiar to full wounds (even if it is deactivated) and reduces the cost of the Overseer's next three abilities by −1 AP. Also, it activates the familiar's unique passive bonus. Key {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.
